meanings: (상태·품질 등이) good, fine, nice, (다른 것보다) better (than), superior (to)

vlive.korean: 이번엔... - 좋다! This time... - Nice! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
오늘 하늘 되게 좋다 하늘~ The sky is really pretty today. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
